item.title: Leveling and Sharpening
item.description: Ever played the game of telephone? By the time the message reaches the last person, it’s often hilariously distorted. That’s Leveling and Sharpening in action â€“ the tendency for our memories to emphasize certain aspects of an event (sharpening) while minimizing or completely eliminating others (leveling). This cognitive bias subtly, yet powerfully, shapes our understanding of the world, our decisions, and even our relationships. Let’s dive into this fascinating phenomenon and explore how to become more aware of its influence.
